verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had given <S%H5117>rest<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from their <S%H341>enemies<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and well <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years,<s%>

that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for their <S%H2205>elders<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and for their <S%H8199>judges<s%> and for their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2204>them,<s%> "I am old and well <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years.<s%>

You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> to all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>you;<s%> for it is Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> who has fought for <S%H3898>you.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5307>allotted<s%> to you these <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> to be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> with all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that I have cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> even to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going down of the <S%H3996>sun.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1920>thrust<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and drive them from out of your <S%H6440>sight.<s%> You shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> spoke to <S%H1696>you.<s%>

"Therefore be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2388>courageous<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that you not <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside from it to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left;<s%>

that you not <S%H935>come<s%> among these <S%H1471>nations,<s%> these that <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2142>you;<s%> neither make mention of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> nor cause to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H5647>them,<s%> neither serve <S%H7812>them,<s%> nor bow down yourselves to them;
but <S%H1692>hold<s%> fast to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has driven <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H376>you.<s%> But as for you, no man has <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand;<s%> for it is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H3898>fights<s%> for <S%H1696>you,<s%> as he spoke to you.
Take <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> therefore to <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> that you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"But if you do at <S%H7725>all<s%> go <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H1692>hold<s%> fast to the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even these who <S%H7604>remain<s%> among <S%H2859>you,<s%> and make marriages with <S%H935>them,<s%> and go in to them, and they to you;

<S%H3045>know<s%> for a <S%H3045>certainty<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will no <S%H3254>longer<s%> drive these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H3423>out<s%> of your <S%H6440>sight;<s%> but they shall be a <S%H6341>snare<s%> and a <S%H4170>trap<s%> to <S%H7850>you,<s%> a scourge in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> until you <S%H6>perish<s%> from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you.<s%>

<S%H3117>"Behold,<s%> today I am <S%H1980>going<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> in all your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> and in all your <S%H5315>souls<s%> that not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> has <S%H5307>failed<s%> of all the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H935>you.<s%> All have happened to <S%H259>you.<s%> Not one <S%H1697>thing<s%> has failed of <S%H5307>it.<s%>

It shall happen that as all the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> on you of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> so Yahweh will <S%H935>bring<s%> on you all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> until he has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you from off this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you,<s%>

when you <S%H5674>disobey<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> and go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>bow<s%> down yourselves to <S%H639>them.<s%> Then the anger of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H6>you,<s%> and you will perish <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from off the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which he has given to <S%H5414>you.<s%>"
